definitions.text: the process whereby a person concentrates on some features of the environment to the (relative) exclusion of others
the work of providing treatment for or attending to someone or something
examples: the old car needs constant attention

definitions.text: a general interest that leads people to want to know more
examples: She was the center of attention
she tried to win his heart with her many attentions

definitions.text: the faculty or power of mental concentration
examples: keeping track of all the details requires your complete attention

definitions.text: a motionless erect stance with arms at the sides and feet together; assumed by military personnel during drill or review
